alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Desha (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 8:17PM CDT until June 25 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BRADLEY...SOUTHEASTERN CLEVELAND...DESHA...DREW... SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND SOUTH CENTRAL ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 817 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Douglas to 8 miles south of Cane Creek State Park to near Herbine, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Warren... Dumas... Dermott... Rohwer... Gould... Gillett... Wilmar... Arkansas City... Mitchellville... Tillar... Watson... Winchester... Jersey Point... Plantersville... Lucca Landing... McGehee... Douglas... Herbine... Yancopin... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
